title: Patch wont install!
body: It's now been 2 hours since I've been trying to get into league of legends. At first it looked like it was downloading fine but then it got stuck at 48%. So then i restarted the launcher and now it's proceeding to scan EVERY FILE ON MY  COMPUTER (or at least it seems like it). I finally got fed up cause it got stuck at 33%, so i just restarted for, like, the 10th time and now it's stuck scanning files. Please help. I just wanna play and this is really starting to become annoying.

replies.body: hey guys I encountered this problem too "unspecified error occurred. please check logs," I restarted my computer and opened the client for it to patch again. this time it worked. Hope this helps
'Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.'
contacted support desk 2 hours ago, but they still haven't responded. What good is a patch if it can't be installed properly?
If it gets stuck at, say, 33%, do i just wait it out or restart? Im really confused, can we get some help?
